title: Mnoleg

|   | A weirdly glowing figure, dancing through the twisted air of Pandemonium. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Mnoleg** is a unique [Pandemonium lord](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord") and guardian of the glowing [rune of Zot](/Rune_of_Zot "Rune of Zot"). Although it has unpredictable melee abilities, it's much more likely to try to kill you through its summoned allies. Mnoleg is accompanied by a horde of [neqoxecs](/Neqoxec "Neqoxec"), [cacodemons](/Cacodemon "Cacodemon"), and assorted [eyeball-type monsters](/List_of_eyeballs "List of eyeballs") on its floor of [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium"), which has dark red floors and yellow walls.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                            |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Dig](/Dig "Dig")                                                          | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Summon Eyeballs](/Summon_Eyeballs "Summon Eyeballs")                      | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Malign Gateway](/Malign_Gateway "Malign Gateway")                         | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Summon Horrible Things](/Summon_Horrible_Things "Summon Horrible Things") | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot5       | [Call of Chaos](/Call_of_Chaos "Call of Chaos")                            | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Mnoleg isn't as innately strong as the other Pan lords, but the summons can get out of control. [Summon Eyeballs](/Summon_Eyeballs "Summon Eyeballs") often creates [floating eyes](/Floating_eye "Floating eye"), which can inflict [paralysis](/Paralysis "Paralysis"). The other summons are no slouch, either; [eldritch tentacles](/Eldritch_tentacle "Eldritch tentacle") inflict [chaotic](/Chaos "Chaos") attacks, while [tentacled monstrosities](/Tentacled_monstrosities "Tentacled monstrosities") can [constrict](/Constrict "Constrict") you in place. Powerful area of effect or piercing attacks are helpful.
  - If you don't have some way of countering floating eyes, be prepared to teleport when you find them.
- Like all [demons](/Demon "Demon"), [holy](/Holy "Holy") and [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") damage are extremely effective. Against Mnoleg, [silver](/Silver "Silver") works just as well.
- Be prepared to be malmutated while in Mnoleg's realm. A source of [mutation resistance](/Mutation_resistance "Mutation resistance") is very helpful, if you have one.
- Mnoleg will be unable to summon eldritch tentacles if you summon one first, via [Malign Gateway](/Malign_Gateway "Malign Gateway").

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Mnoleg's spell set included [Random Bolt](/Random_Bolt "Random Bolt").
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), Mnoleg was considered male.
- In [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Mnoleg gained [Call of Chaos](/Call_of_Chaos "Call of Chaos"), [Random Bolt](/Random_Bolt "Random Bolt"), and [Dig](/Dig "Dig").
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), Mnoleg also had Klown and MR Vulnerability attack flavours.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), Mnoleg did not have Klown and MR Vulnerability flavoured attacks, but did have [Smite](/Smite "Smite").
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), Mnoleg did not have blinking and mutagenic attacks and [summoned greater demons](/Summon_Greater_Demon "Summon Greater Demon") instead of eyes. He also had less [HP](/HP "HP").
- In early versions of the game, Mnoleg came with two [eldritch tentacles](/Eldritch_tentacle "Eldritch tentacle") attached to him.

Mnoleg

Mnoleg & 
HP 230-464
HD 17
XP 10843
Speed 13
AC 10
EV 25
Will Immune
Attack1 40 (claw: plain)
Attack2 35 (tentacle slap: mutate)
Attack3 30 (gore: plain)
Attack4 23 (kick: blink)
Resistances rF+
rElec
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm

Silver

A weirdly glowing figure, dancing through the twisted air of Pandemonium.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Mnoleg is a unique Pandemonium lord and guardian of the glowing rune of Zot. Although it has unpredictable melee abilities, it's much more likely to try to kill you through its summoned allies. Mnoleg is accompanied by a horde of neqoxecs, cacodemons, and assorted eyeball-type monsters on its floor of Pandemonium, which has dark red floors and yellow walls.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Dig Magical flag
Slot2 Summon Eyeballs Magical flag
Slot3 Malign Gateway Magical flag
Slot4 Summon Horrible Things Magical flag
Slot5 Call of Chaos Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Mnoleg isn't as innately strong as the other Pan lords, but the summons can get out of control. Summon Eyeballs often creates floating eyes, which can inflict paralysis. The other summons are no slouch, either; eldritch tentacles inflict chaotic attacks, while tentacled monstrosities can constrict you in place. Powerful area of effect or piercing attacks are helpful.
    • If you don't have some way of countering floating eyes, be prepared to teleport when you find them.
  • Like all demons, holy and holy wrath damage are extremely effective. Against Mnoleg, silver works just as well.
  • Be prepared to be malmutated while in Mnoleg's realm. A source of mutation resistance is very helpful, if you have one.
  • Mnoleg will be unable to summon eldritch tentacles if you summon one first, via Malign Gateway.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, Mnoleg's spell set included Random Bolt.
  • Prior to 0.19, Mnoleg was considered male.
  • In 0.18, Mnoleg gained Call of Chaos, Random Bolt, and Dig.
  • Prior to 0.17, Mnoleg also had Klown and MR Vulnerability attack flavours.
  • Prior to 0.16, Mnoleg did not have Klown and MR Vulnerability flavoured attacks, but did have Smite.
  • Prior to 0.8, Mnoleg did not have blinking and mutagenic attacks and summoned greater demons instead of eyes. He also had less HP.
  • In early versions of the game, Mnoleg came with two eldritch tentacles attached to him.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Mnoleg''' is a unique [[Pandemonium lord]] and guardian of the glowing [[rune of Zot]]. Although it has unpredictable melee abilities, it's much more likely to try to kill you through its summoned allies. Mnoleg is accompanied by a horde of [[neqoxec]]s, [[cacodemon]]s, and assorted [[list of eyeballs|eyeball-type monsters]] on its floor of [[Pandemonium]], which has dark red floors and yellow walls.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Mnoleg isn't as innately strong as the other Pan lords, but the summons can get out of control. [[Summon Eyeballs]] often creates [[floating eye]]s, which can inflict [[paralysis]]. The other summons are no slouch, either; [[eldritch tentacle]]s inflict [[chaos|chaotic]] attacks, while [[tentacled monstrosities]] can [[constrict]] you in place. Powerful area of effect or piercing attacks are helpful.
**If you don't have some way of countering floating eyes, be prepared to teleport when you find them.
*Like all [[demon]]s, [[holy]] and [[holy wrath]] damage are extremely effective. Against Mnoleg, [[silver]] works just as well.
*Be prepared to be malmutated while in Mnoleg's realm. A source of [[mutation resistance]] is very helpful, if you have one.
*Mnoleg will be unable to summon eldritch tentacles if you summon one first, via [[Malign Gateway]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], Mnoleg's spell set included [[Random Bolt]].
*Prior to [[0.19]], Mnoleg was considered male.
*In [[0.18]], Mnoleg gained [[Call of Chaos]], [[Random Bolt]], and [[Dig]].
*Prior to [[0.17]], Mnoleg also had Klown and MR Vulnerability attack flavours.
*Prior to [[0.16]], Mnoleg did not have Klown and MR Vulnerability flavoured attacks, but did have [[Smite]].
*Prior to [[0.8]], Mnoleg did not have blinking and mutagenic attacks and [[Summon Greater Demon|summoned greater demons]] instead of eyes. He also had less [[HP]].
*In early versions of the game, Mnoleg came with two [[eldritch tentacle]]s attached to him.
